articles.title: Macrotech Developers Q3 Results: Net profit rises 25% to ₹505 crore, revenue up 65% YoY | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Macrotech Developers Q3 Results: The realty firm's revenue from operations in the third quarter of current fiscal rose 65.2 per cent at  ₹2,930.6 crore, compared to  ₹1,774 crore in the corresponding period last year.
articles.content: Macrotech Developers Q3 Results: Macrotech Developers announced its October-December quarter results for fiscal 2023-24 (Q3FY24) on Saturday, reporting a rise of 25 per cent in consolidated net profi… [+3591 chars]
